text: David Sanford Milch (born March 23, 1945) is an American television director and writer. He has created several television shows, including NYPD Blue (co- created with Steven Bochco) and Deadwood. He was born in Buffalo, New York. Milch has bipolar disorder. He was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People with bipolar disorder Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Writers from Buffalo, New York
title: David Milch
